alert.note: Alert for Gogebic; Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 9:17PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN GOGEBIC AND NORTHWESTERN ONTONAGON COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM EDT/900 PM CDT/... At 915 PM EDT/815 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles northwest of Silver City to near Upson. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ontonagon, Porcupine Mountains State Park, Ironwood, Bessemer, Wakefield, Marenisco, Bergland, Northern Lake Gogebic, Silver City, Thomaston, Van Buskirk, Presque Isle Reservoir, Lake Gogebic State Park, Copper Peak, Lake of the Clouds, Clark Lake, White Pine, Ironwood Airport, and Mirror Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
